casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Mark Leonard MORGAN. No. 203P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 11, 2008. Allen Brotherton, Charlotte, for Morgan.

Peter S. Gilchrist, III, District Attorney.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 662 S.E.2d 558.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th day of April 2008 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion for Stay Dissolved by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of December 2008."
